title: Valerii Khomenko, Author at SE Ranking Blog

Listen DoFollow Podcast Sign inStart free trial Log out Projects Skip to content Blog / Archives for Valerii Khomenko Valerii Khomenko Valerii is an SEO Specialist with 7+ years of experience in highly competitive niches. He manages multiple projects and workstreams, organizing the team's workflow. With a top-notch understanding of Google's algorithms, Valerii specializes in professional Off/On/Technical/Before/After/Under/In/Above/Behind Page Optimization. SEO is a big passion of his, but he also loves to travel, particularly to sunny destinations by the ocean. This has taken him to many places in Asia.
